item.title: After Rebirth, I Married my Archenemy
item.volume: Volume 2: A Blade Drawn on the Bowstring
item.nameextend: ***I already have someone in my heart***
item.description:
Before her death, Qun Qing hated the powerful official Lu Huating the most. She hated him for assisting the new emperor and for being cunning and insidious. She thought about him day and night, and tried her best to defeat him, but she was not his match. In the end, she became a cannon fodder in his hands.

After Qun Qing died, she saw the princess of the fallen country that she had protected with her life, crying and leaning on the new emperorâ€™s chest: â€œQung Qing is dead, what should I do?â€
The new emperor kissed her: â€œYou will be fine, just love me.â€
The princess burst into tears, like a delicate flower under the rain: â€œQung Qing is dead, Your Majesty is all I have left.â€

When she opened his eyes, Qun Qing had woke up three years ago. She stood up, woodenly packed her bags, and regardless of the princessâ€™s obstruction, took off her jade crown and walked away, dropped her female officialâ€™s wooden seal, turned around and left, leaving behind ten years of careful planning and treading on thin ice.

Restore the country? Pfft, restore it my foot.
â€”â€”

The powerful minister Lu Huating is deeply cunning, ruthless, and dominates the power struggles of the court. Tired of the ugly nature of human hearts, his life has become dull and unfulfilling.

Looking back on his life, the only thing that left an impression was a female officer, a spy, whom he poisoned to death at the age of twenty-six.

For the love of the princess, she sacrificed his life for the country and schemed against him several times. In the end, she knelt in front of the Summer Palace, her facial expression remaining unchanged, with a look of resentment in her eyes, and sighed with a smile, â€œThe king who wins is the ruler, and the one who loses is the defeated,â€ before raising her head and drinking to the last drop. Bl00d poured from her lips, a thin layer of vivid red.

When he opened his eyes again, Lu Huating returned to his twenty-three-year-old self.

Lu Huating looked at the documents under his command, and felt even more bored. He put down his brush and leaned on the back of the chair: â€œWhere is the female official accompanying Crown Princess?â€

â€œâ€¦ She resigned. She asked me to tell My lord that she would not fight anymore.â€

Lu Huating was silent for a while, and curled his lips coldly: â€œShe said she wonâ€™t fight, so the fight is over?â€

If youâ€™re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

If you spot any mistakes in my translation, feel free to DM me on Discord (KatTL) or report it at Dragonholic Discord server.

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthlessâ€”capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodderâ€™s script, Sheng Nuan is terrifiedâ€¦

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: â€œNuan Nuan, youâ€™re not allowed to go anywhere except by my sideâ€¦â€

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: â€œNuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?â€

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: â€œNuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.â€

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: â€œNuan Nuan, itâ€™s your choiceâ€”kill me, or save me.â€

Sheng Nuan became even more panickedâ€¦

If youâ€™re enjoying the story, please consider:

  1. Supporting the author
  2. Rating or leaving a review on NovelUpdates!

item.title: The Eldest Legitimate Daughter is Both Beautiful and Valiant (ELDBBV)
item.description:
In the previous life, the Zhenguo Dukeâ€™s mansion collapsed and completely vanished. In this lifetime, Bai Qing Yan, the eldest legitimate daughter was reborn and she will never let the Bai family follow the same footsteps than in the previous life.

The sons of the Bai family are already dead, so is there no place for the Bai family to stand in the capital?

Xiao Rong Yan, a wealthy businessman from the Wei Kingdom said: â€œFor hundreds of years, the Zhenguo Dukeâ€™s Bai family of military lineage, never produced any waste, and the familyâ€™s daughters are no exception.â€

Laterâ€¦ the eldest miss of the Bai family was this generationâ€™s goddess of war, legend had it that she had never been defeated.

The second miss of the Bai family was the resourceful matriarch at the newly appointed Zhongyong Marquisâ€™ mansion.

The third miss of the Bai family is this worldâ€™s second richest merchant, a talent of the business world who can decide the rains and clouds.

Bai Qing Yan was grateful to Xiao Rong Yan for having helped her several times in the previous life, and secretly sent him information several times.

On a snowy night, they were blocked outside the city.

Xiao Rong Yan: Miss Bai saved me from fire and water again and again, is it that you admire me?

Bai Qing Yan said: Young Master Xiao has misunderstood.

Xiao Rong Yan: I saved Miss Bai from fire and water again and again, can Miss Bai admire me?

Bai Qing Yan: â€¦

item.title: Rebirth of the Excellent Daughter of the Marquis Household (REDMH)
item.nameextend: ***Could it be that they had to sleep together?***
item.description:
Gu Yu Qi, a daughter born to a marquis household. She was beautiful with knowledge in both civil and military, and her kindness broader than the sky. It was love at first sight for her, and she insisted on marrying him and was happy even if she were to become a mistress. She worked hard to help him step by step to become the emperor.

But what happened to her in the end?

For ten whole years, she was humiliated and abandoned. Disheartened, she drank poison to end her life and set her place on fire, only to find herself back to when she was ten years old. It was the year she followed her mother into the capital. It wasnâ€™t too late to change her fate.

If Yun Ke had any regrets in his previous life, then it would be how he always kept thinking about a woman who died decades ago. Because of that, before he died, he secretly had the womanâ€™s ashes pressed beneath his coffin. As the emperor, he had the final say of everything under the sky. So how could he allow that woman to be arrogant in front of him? Even at his deathbed, he would crush her beneath him.

Who knew heâ€™d be reborn againâ€¦

When the transmigrated girl meets the boy who was reborn, Gu Yu Qi simply wanted to yell at the sky. Just what are you playing at!?

item.title: The Foolish General's Mute Spouse
item.description:
General Qi Ren, known as the â€œMad Wolfâ€ was once an undefeated war god. However, he was poisoned by an enemy spy on the battlefield, which left him mentally impaired, leading to the tragic downfall of a legendary hero. The Emperor, relieved to have neutralized this formidable threat to his throne, felt a twinge of guilt. Hearing rumors that the â€œmadmanâ€ harbored affection for the timid and mute Seventh Prince, Fu Yuâ€™an, the Emperor decided to arrange their marriage, believing it to be a benevolent gesture.

However, after the wedding, Fu Yuâ€™an, who had to play both father and mother to the seemingly foolish general, was shocked when he saw the â€œmadmanâ€ climbing into his bed with clear, calculating eyes. Fu Yuâ€™an kicked him off and exclaimed, â€œYouâ€™re not a fool?â€

To which Qi Ren retorted, â€œAnd youâ€™re not mute, are you? Weâ€™re both hiding our true selvesâ€”so why the disdain?â€

â€œâ€¦â€

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.description:
At the princessâ€™s banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face.

Their eyes met, and in each otherâ€™s gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair.
â€œIâ€™ll go firstâ€¦â€
â€œIâ€™ll head that wayâ€¦â€

However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princessâ€™s maid and the second princeâ€™s attendant searching for them not far away.
Helan Ci bit her lip: â€œWhat donâ€™t you just go to the princess?â€
Lu Wuyou endured: â€œI think the second prince is not bad either.â€
Helan Ci: â€œIf we keep talking, weâ€™ll only end up hurting each other!â€
Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: â€œThen let it be a mutual destruction.â€
Helan Ci: â€œâ€¦?â€

A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husbandâ€™s demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes.
Helan Ci asked, â€œâ€¦Can you handle this?â€
Lu Wuyou replied, â€œEven if I canâ€™t, I have to. Who told me to marry youâ€” Iâ€™m going to be a powerful minister. I canâ€™t fall here.â€
Helan Ci, â€œThen do your best! Iâ€™m counting on you!â€
Lu Wuyou, â€œâ€¦?â€

Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past.

A student asked him how he had come this far.

Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress.

item.title: Sweet Hunting Ground [GB]
item.description:
Ani belongs to a nearly extinct species with unparalleled mimicry abilities.

In order to survive, she joins the infamous interstellar live-streamed hunting game, taking on the form of a seemingly ordinary human girlâ€”wide-eyed, innocent, and sweetly smiling.

No one expects such a fragile-looking human to last more than three days.

Yet, as the months pass, the audience watches in growing horror. Not only has this delicate girl survived, but she has fought her way into the finals. The once-dominant warriors, who were the center of attention, now flinch at the mere mention of her name, instinctively retreating as if facing their natural predator.

â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

Ani bears the heavy responsibility of continuing her species. She is the last of her kind.

To ensure her raceâ€™s survival, she must seek out the strongest and most exceptional beings across the universe to reproduce with.

While her opponents view her as an enemy in a life-or-death battle, Ani has already begun her own special hunt.

Within her hunting grounds, bl00d turns sweet, pain transforms into pleasure, and slaughter weaves an inescapable web of desire.

And those caught in her web? They become hersâ€”completely.

â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

At some point, the prey began to come to her willingly.

A man who was once formidable and battle-hardened, grasps her hand, and pressed it against his abdomen, willingly giving up his body for her to alter. He, who once struck fear across the battlefield, now stands before her with an almost desperate plea.

His voice is low, uncertain, yet filled with expectation.

â€œAniâ€¦ You will take responsibility right?â€

â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

Reader Advisory

[Suggestive Content Alert!]

â€¢Technically not smut, but itâ€™s not really suggested for U-18 either!!!

â€¢Tentacle protagonist, male pregnancy.

â€¢Niche themes, self-indulgent writingâ€”proceed with caution if not your cup of tea.

item.description:
Since I have no money, I go with free-to-play gear and push through the dungeon by mastering magic.

What he chose to do to support his family was to venture into the dungeon.

What he desires is an ordinary life.

However, his extraordinary talent gradually became the talk of the townâ€”

â€œIf I can earn money, Iâ€™ll do anything.â€

For his family, Itsuki steps into the depths of the dungeon.

â€œIsnâ€™t that guyâ€™s magic kind of weird?â€

There are no parents, and the only one who can support the family is the middle school graduate, Itsuki.

What he chose to do to support his family was to venture into the dungeon.

What he desires is an ordinary life.

However, his extraordinary talent gradually became the talk of the townâ€”

â€œIf I can earn money, Iâ€™ll do anything.â€

For his family, Itsuki steps into the depths of the dungeon.

â€œIsnâ€™t that guyâ€™s magic kind of weird?â€

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthlessâ€”capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodderâ€™s script, Sheng Nuan is terrifiedâ€¦

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: â€œNuan Nuan, youâ€™re not allowed to go anywhere except by my sideâ€¦â€

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: â€œNuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?â€

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: â€œNuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.â€

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: â€œNuan Nuan, itâ€™s your choiceâ€”kill me, or save me.â€

Sheng Nuan became even more panickedâ€¦

item.title: Transmigrating Before The Crazy Beauty Scum A Loses Control
item.description:
Summary 1:

â€œEven if itâ€™s a one-for-one trade, I will take over his company.â€

These were the last words Luan Yenan said before transmigrating into a book.

As the sole head of a Fortune 500 investment company, she never expected her end to be dying from overwork after three sleepless days and nights, only to transmigrate into a novel.

The character she transmigrated into was a crazy, abusive Alpha who tormented the female lead before having her glands removed by the seemingly innocent but secretly cunning female lead.

Crazy? Perfect, Iâ€™m crazy too.

Abusive Alpha? Sorry, Iâ€™m single and not interested.

As for the female lead, are you talking about the little girl Iâ€™ve pinned down, teary-eyed and begging for mercy?

Seemingly innocent but secretly cunning? Interesting.

Let me personally train her. I want to see how she plans to cut out my glands.

Summary 2:

Zuo Baixuan, who had just differentiated into an Omega, was sold by her adoptive parents to a crazy, abusive Alpha. She thought her life would be plunged into darkness from then on.

Unexpectedly, on the first day of their marriage, when she was pinned down, the Alpha, who was on the verge of losing control, suddenly calmed down and retracted her pheromones after Zuo Baixuan said, â€œI want to graduate smoothly, I donâ€™t want to have a child so early.â€

After that, the previously good-for-nothing Alpha seemed like a completely different person. She became a guest professor at the university, started a company, helped Zuo Baixuan seek revenge, and together they reached the pinnacle of life.

One day, Luan Yenanâ€™s pheromones went haywire, and she lay on her deathbed: â€œIâ€™ll set you free, letâ€™s get a divorce.â€

Zuo Baixuan chuckled, grabbed Luan Yenanâ€™s hands, and pulled her closer: â€œIâ€™ve already graduated.â€

â€œSo?â€

â€œI want to have a child. With you.â€

Letâ€™s see whoâ€™s really the crazy one.

After that, the previously good-for-nothing Alpha seemed like a completely different person. She became a guest professor at the university, started a company, helped Zuo Baixuan seek revenge, and together they reached the pinnacle of life.

Zuo Baixuan chuckled, grabbed Luan Yenanâ€™s hands, and pulled her closer: â€œIâ€™ve already graduated.â€

â€œSo?â€

â€œI want to have a child. With you.â€

Letâ€™s see whoâ€™s really the crazy one.

item.title: It Was A Fake Marriage, But Jiu Qian Sui Took It Seriously
item.nameextend: ***Just Wanted to Give Her a Title***
item.description:
OVERVIEW:

In her past life, Shen Qing Li married her cousin Jiang Zhi Li with a huge dowry left by her father. She thought her new family was kind, but they were all wolves in disguise, just wanting to take her familyâ€™s wealth. She not only helped her husband raise the son of his mistress, but the mistress openly moved into their home, took over her position, and even mistreated her child. In the end, both she and her child met a tragic end. In this life, Shen Qing Li firmly broke off the engagement with Jiang Zhi Li and decided to leave with her mother. However, her maternal family set up something unexpected.

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.description:
At the princessâ€™s banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face.

Their eyes met, and in each otherâ€™s gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair.
â€œIâ€™ll go firstâ€¦â€
â€œIâ€™ll head that wayâ€¦â€

However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princessâ€™s maid and the second princeâ€™s attendant searching for them not far away.
Helan Ci bit her lip: â€œWhat donâ€™t you just go to the princess?â€
Lu Wuyou endured: â€œI think the second prince is not bad either.â€
Helan Ci: â€œIf we keep talking, weâ€™ll only end up hurting each other!â€
Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: â€œThen let it be a mutual destruction.â€
Helan Ci: â€œâ€¦?â€

A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husbandâ€™s demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes.
Helan Ci asked, â€œâ€¦Can you handle this?â€
Lu Wuyou replied, â€œEven if I canâ€™t, I have to. Who told me to marry youâ€” Iâ€™m going to be a powerful minister. I canâ€™t fall here.â€
Helan Ci, â€œThen do your best! Iâ€™m counting on you!â€
Lu Wuyou, â€œâ€¦?â€

Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past.

A student asked him how he had come this far.

Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress.

=====

item.title: Quick Transmigration: The Villain Is Too Pampered and Alluring
item.nameextend: ***Didnâ€™t We Agree the Crown Prince Was a Sister? 039***
item.description:
To survive, Sheng Nuan must traverse different worlds, playing the role of self-destructive cannon fodder while saving the darkest villains. These villains are cold-blooded, obsessive, and ruthlessâ€”capable of annihilating millions with a smile and destroying the world with a wave of their hand. Holding the cannon fodderâ€™s script, Sheng Nuan is terrifiedâ€¦

Later:

A paranoid young man with a gloomy expression: â€œNuan Nuan, youâ€™re not allowed to go anywhere except by my sideâ€¦â€

The cold-blooded emperor whose face was stained with bl00d: â€œNuan Nuan, for you, what does it matter if the empire falls?â€

The demonized immortal with snow-white hair: â€œNuan Nuan, you are my inner demon.â€

The zombie king of the apocalypse with an unwavering gaze: â€œNuan Nuan, itâ€™s your choiceâ€”kill me, or save me.â€

Sheng Nuan became even more panickedâ€¦

item.title: The Foolish General's Mute Spouse
item.description:
General Qi Ren, known as the â€œMad Wolfâ€ was once an undefeated war god. However, he was poisoned by an enemy spy on the battlefield, which left him mentally impaired, leading to the tragic downfall of a legendary hero. The Emperor, relieved to have neutralized this formidable threat to his throne, felt a twinge of guilt. Hearing rumors that the â€œmadmanâ€ harbored affection for the timid and mute Seventh Prince, Fu Yuâ€™an, the Emperor decided to arrange their marriage, believing it to be a benevolent gesture.

However, after the wedding, Fu Yuâ€™an, who had to play both father and mother to the seemingly foolish general, was shocked when he saw the â€œmadmanâ€ climbing into his bed with clear, calculating eyes. Fu Yuâ€™an kicked him off and exclaimed, â€œYouâ€™re not a fool?â€

To which Qi Ren retorted, â€œAnd youâ€™re not mute, are you? Weâ€™re both hiding our true selvesâ€”so why the disdain?â€

â€œâ€¦â€

item.title: My Husband Became the Most Powerful Minister
item.nameextend: ***"Don't you want to get used to it?"***
item.description:
At the princessâ€™s banquet, in a secluded hall, Helan Ci pressed her palm against the wall, encountering the equally disheveled newly crowned top scholar Lu Wuyou. One was as delicate as a willow, the other had a flushed face.

Their eyes met, and in each otherâ€™s gaze, they saw a glimmer of despair.
â€œIâ€™ll go firstâ€¦â€
â€œIâ€™ll head that wayâ€¦â€

However, what was even more despairing was the sound of the princessâ€™s maid and the second princeâ€™s attendant searching for them not far away.
Helan Ci bit her lip: â€œWhat donâ€™t you just go to the princess?â€
Lu Wuyou endured: â€œI think the second prince is not bad either.â€
Helan Ci: â€œIf we keep talking, weâ€™ll only end up hurting each other!â€
Lu Wuyou closed his eyes: â€œThen let it be a mutual destruction.â€
Helan Ci: â€œâ€¦?â€

A night later, their innocence was lost, and they were forced into marriage. Yet, with strong enemies lurking, this marriage was extremely difficult. On one side, there was the second prince, eagerly awaiting her husbandâ€™s demise, and on the other, the princess, watching her with cold eyes.
Helan Ci asked, â€œâ€¦Can you handle this?â€
Lu Wuyou replied, â€œEven if I canâ€™t, I have to. Who told me to marry youâ€” Iâ€™m going to be a powerful minister. I canâ€™t fall here.â€
Helan Ci, â€œThen do your best! Iâ€™m counting on you!â€
Lu Wuyou, â€œâ€¦?â€

Years later, Lu Wuyou became the Prime Minister, holding the highest position among officials, wielding immense power across the land, and reflecting on the past.

A student asked him how he had come this far.

Prime Minister Lu thought to himself that as long as one marries a wife of extraordinary beauty, often coveted by others, it would always inspire one to strive to make progress.
